description: This file defines a React component 'DndPortal' which creates and manages a DOM portal for use with react-beautiful-dnd's draggable elements. It also includes a function to get or create the portal element in the DOM, ensuring a stable overlay container for drag-and-drop operations.

methods.name: getOrCreateDndPortal()
methods.description: Creates or retrieves a DOM element with id 'dnd-portal' to serve as a portal container for drag-and-drop overlay.

methods.name: DndPortal({ children })
methods.description: React component that renders its children into the Dnd portal using ReactDOM.createPortal.
